title: Linked Data Toolkit
description: A TypeScript library and CLI tool for querying SPARQL endpoints across multiple authorities, vocabularies, and heritage data sources. Originally created in Java (2013), modernized with TypeScript for enhanced type safety and developer experience.
technologies: TypeScript, Node.js, SPARQL, DBPedia, Geonames, Getty AAT, Nomisma

title: Belling the Cat: A Linked Open Data Tutorial
description: A practical workshop guide for publishing CIDOC CRM cultural heritage data as Linked Open Data using free and open-source software
technologies: CIDOC CRM, RDF/XML, Virtuoso, SPARQL, Raspberry Pi

title: Sikyon Survey Data Processing Scripts
description: Automated data cleaning, integration, and analysis scripts for the Sikyon Survey Project, processing pottery and architectural survey data from 2004-2009 excavations. Originally developed in 2008, modernized with Java 17+ and Spring Boot for the project monograph published in Meletemata (2018).
technologies: Java 17, Spring Boot, MS Access, UCanAccess, Docker, Maven, GIS

title: ADS 3D Viewer
description: A pioneering web-based 3D visualization platform for archaeological data, funded by Marie Curie Actions. The first example of browser-based WebGL stratigraphic visualization integrated within a trusted digital repository (ADS). Enables real-time 3D model interaction and multi-layer stratigraphic analysis directly in web browsers.
technologies: WebGL, 3DHOP, JavaScript, OBJ, Touch Controls, Trackball Navigation

title: Archaeological Database System
description: A comprehensive database system for managing archaeological excavation data

title: GIS Mapping Tool
description: Interactive mapping tool for archaeological sites

title: Digital Archive Platform
description: Platform for digitizing and archiving historical documents
